feed.title: Category: iPad | This Is My Blog

entry.title: iPad Charging Costs $1.36 per Year
entry.content:
According to the Electric Power Research Institute (ERPI), it only costs $1.36 per year to charge your iPad (source).

Just to satisfy my curiousity, I ran my iPad charge through a Kill-A-Watt 4400 to see how much electricity I was "leaking" when not charging my iPad. The result: unmeasurable by the meter after a day.
